item.title: What Is Toll Free?
item.description:
The term “toll free number” is widely recognized, with most people having used one. But what exactly does it mean and how do businesses acquire them? Unlike standard phone numbers automatically assigned with landline, VoIP, or cellular services, toll free numbers require a separate process. In the US and Canada, phone numbers follow the North American Numbering Plan (NANP) format: 1-NPA-NXX-XXXX.
